title: Yu Shang Food, Inc. Recalls Ready-To-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: November 25, 2024 - The product list and labels have been updated with additional products. Please check back frequently as additional products could be added. WASHINGTON, Nov. 21, 2024 - Yu Shang Food, Inc., a Spartanburg, SC, establishment, is recalling approximately 72,240 pounds...
